<A NAME="eolPage29"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ANNEX A
</FONT>
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SERIES A CONVERTIBLE PREFERRED STOCK
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Certain Definitions
</I>
	.&#160; Unless the context otherwise requires, the terms defined in this paragraph 1 shall have, for all purposes hereof, the meanings herein specified.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
</FONT>
<B>
	Additional Equity
</B>
	&#148; means any shares of Junior Stock, Parity Stock or Senior Stock issued after the first Issue Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Business Day
</B>
	&#148; means any day except a Saturday, a Sunday or a day on which banking institutions in New York, New York are not required to be open.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Common Stock
</B>
	&#148; means all shares now or hereafter authorized of any class of Common Stock of the Corporation and any other stock of the Corporation, howsoever designated, authorized after the first Issue Date, which has the right (subject always to prior rights of any class or series of Preferred Stock) to participate in the distribution of the assets and earnings of the Corporation without limit as to per share amount.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Conversion Date
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in subparagraph 5(e)&nbsp;below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Conversion Notice
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in subparagraph 5(b)&nbsp;below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Conversion Price
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;if determined in connection with a pending or consummated IPO, the initial public offering price per share of Common Stock, as set forth in the final prospectus for the IPO filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission pursuant to Rule&nbsp;424(b)&nbsp;promulgated under the Securities Act, or (b)&nbsp;if determined in connection with a pending or consummated Sale Transaction, the price per share attributable to the Common Stock in connection with the Sale Transaction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Coverage Ratio
</B>
	&#148; of the Corporation, as of any date of determination, means the ratio, pro forma for the issuance of any Additional Equity and any associated transaction prompting such determination, of (a)&nbsp;the aggregate gross purchase price attributable to the then outstanding shares of Junior Stock to (b)&nbsp;the aggregate gross purchase price attributable to the then outstanding shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock, Parity Stock and Senior Stock, in each
</FONT>
	case excluding any accrued and unpaid dividends and dividends paid in kind (whether by the issuance of additional shares, an increase in liquidation preferences or otherwise).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Defaulting Holder
</B>
	&#148; means any holder of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock that has been deemed to be, and continues to be, a defaulting holder under section 1(c)&nbsp;of such holder&#146;s Subscription Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Dividend Payment Date
</B>
	&#148; means March&nbsp;31, June&nbsp;30, September&nbsp;30 and December&nbsp;31 of each year, beginning March&nbsp;31, 2012.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	30
<A NAME="A2227485ZEX-3_1_HTM_23256-2-KE-05_PB_30_082310_2794">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=30,EFW="2227485",CP="ARES COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE CORP",DN="2",CHK=908822,FOLIO='30',FILE="DISK106:[15ZCW2.15ZCW15602]23256-2-KE-05_ZCW15602.CHC",USER="VRIVERA",CD='FEB 27 12:25 2016' -->
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Dividend Period
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;the period beginning on the first Issue Date and ending on the first Dividend Payment Date and (b)&nbsp;each quarterly period between Dividend Payment Dates thereafter.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Estimated Conversion Price
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;if determined in connection with a pending IPO, the range of the initial public offering price set forth in the marketing materials used in connection with the IPO, or (b)&nbsp;if determined in connection with a pending Sale Transaction, the price per share of Common Stock being paid in the Sale Transaction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	IPO
</B>
	&#148; means a
<I>
	bona fide
</I>
	underwritten public offering pursuant to an effective registration statement under the Securities Act, covering the offering and sale of the Common Stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Issue Date
</B>
	&#148; means the date that a share of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock is issued by the Corporation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Junior Stock
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;for purposes of paragraphs 2 and 6 below, the Common Stock and any other class or series of stock of the Corporation not entitled to receive any dividends in any Dividend Period unless all dividends required to have been paid or declared and set apart for payment on the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall have been so paid or declared and set apart for payment and (b)&nbsp;for purposes of paragraphs 3 and 6 below, any class or series of stock of the Corporation not entitled to receive any assets upon a Liquidation until the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall have received the entire amount to which such stock is entitled upon such Liquidation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Liquidation
</B>
	&#148; means any termination, liquidation, dissolution or winding up of the affairs of the Corporation, whether voluntary or involuntary;
<I>
	provided that
</I>
	neither the consolidation or merger of the Corporation into or with another entity or entities, nor the sale or transfer of all or substantially all of the assets of the Corporation to another entity or entities shall be deemed a Liquidation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Liquidation Preference
</B>
	&#148; means the sum of (a)&nbsp;the Subscription Price, (b)&nbsp;any dividends per share added thereto pursuant to subparagraph 2(c)&nbsp;below and (c)&nbsp;any accrued and unpaid dividends per share.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Non-Converting Shares
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in subparagraph 5(c)&nbsp;below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Parity Stock
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;for purposes of paragraphs 2 and 6 below, any other class or series of stock of the Corporation entitled to receive payment of dividends on a parity with the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and (b)&nbsp;for purposes of paragraphs 3 and 6 below, any other class or series of stock of the Corporation entitled to receive assets upon a Liquidation on a parity with the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Permitted Dividends
</B>
	&#148; means dividends payable in shares of the class or series of stock of the Corporation upon which such dividends are declared or paid, or payable in shares of Common Stock with respect to Junior Stock other than Common Stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	31
<A NAME="A2227485ZEX-3_1_HTM_23256-2-KE-07_PB_31_082409_2980">

<A NAME="eolPage30"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Prevailing Dividend Rate
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;beginning on the first Issue Date through and including December&nbsp;31, 2012, 10% per annum, (b)&nbsp;beginning on January&nbsp;1, 2013 through and including December&nbsp;31, 2013, 11% per annum, (c)&nbsp;beginning on January&nbsp;1, 2014 through and including December&nbsp;31, 2014, 12% per annum, and (d)&nbsp;beginning on January&nbsp;1, 2015 and thereafter, 13% per annum;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	,
<I>
	however
</I>
	, that upon the occurrence of the Coverage Ratio exceeding 1.65:1, the Prevailing Dividend Rate, on a go forward basis after such occurrence shall be reduced to (w)&nbsp;for the period from the first Issue Date through and including December&nbsp;31, 2012, 8% per annum, (x)&nbsp;for the period from January&nbsp;1, 2013 through and including December&nbsp;31, 2013, 9% per annum, (y)&nbsp;for the period from January&nbsp;1, 2014 through and including December&nbsp;31, 2014, 10% per annum, and (z)&nbsp;for the period from January&nbsp;1, 2015 and thereafter, 11% per annum.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Record Date
</B>
	&#148; means, with respect to the dividend payable on March&nbsp;31, June&nbsp;30, September&nbsp;30 and December&nbsp;31, respectively, of each year, the preceding March&nbsp;15, June&nbsp;15, September&nbsp;15 and December&nbsp;15, or such other record date not more than 90 days preceding the applicable Dividend Payment Date designated by the Board of Directors with respect to the dividend payable on such respective Dividend Payment Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Redemption Date
</B>
	&#148; means the date fixed for redemption of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock pursuant to paragraph 4 below or, if the Corporation shall default in the payment of the Redemption Price on such date, the date the Corporation actually makes such payment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Redemption Notice
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning set forth in subparagraph 4(b)&nbsp;below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Redemption Price
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;in the case of shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock held by Defaulting Holders, the Subscription Price, and (b)&nbsp;in the case of all other shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock, the sum of (i)&nbsp;the Liquidation Preference on the Redemption Date and (ii)&nbsp;an amount equal to a percentage of the Subscription Price, which percentage shall be no less than 5% and no more than 10% and shall be the lowest percentage that, when applied to the calculation of the Redemption Price, would result in such holder of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock receiving a total return (taking into account the Redemption Price, all dividends paid in cash to such holder and any other cash payments made to such holder of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock pursuant to the terms of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock or pursuant to the terms of such holder&#146;s Subscription Agreement) on the Subscription Price of 14% unless such amount would be less than 5% of the Subscription Price (in which case 5% of the Subscription Price shall be added) or such amount would exceed 10% of the Subscription Price (in which case 10% of the Subscription Price shall be added).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Sale Transaction
</B>
	&#148; means a transaction (other than an IPO) that results in the Corporation receiving stock of a publicly traded company as a result of a consolidation or merger of the Corporation or the sale of substantially all of the Corporation&#146;s assets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Securities Act
</B>
	&#148; means the Securities Act of 1933, as amended.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">

<B>
	Senior Stock
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;for purposes of paragraphs 2 and 6 below, any class or series of stock of the Corporation issued after the first Issue Date ranking senior to the Series&nbsp;A
</FONT>

	Preferred Stock in respect of the right to receive dividends, and (b)&nbsp;for purposes of paragraphs 3 and 6 below, any class or series of stock of the Corporation issued after the first Issue Date ranking senior to the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock in respect of the right to receive assets upon a Liquidation.

</B>

</FONT>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	&#148; means $50,000.00 per share.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Subsidiary
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;a corporation more than 50% of the combined voting power of the outstanding Voting Stock of which is owned, directly or indirectly, by the Corporation, or by one or more Subsidiaries, or by the Corporation and one or more Subsidiaries, (b)&nbsp;a partnership of which the Corporation, or one or more other Subsidiaries, or the Corporation and one or more Subsidiaries, directly or indirectly, is the general partner and has the power to direct the policies management and affairs or (c)&nbsp;any other person (other than a corporation) in which the Corporation, or one or more Subsidiaries, or the Corporation and one or more Subsidiaries, directly or indirectly, has at least a majority ownership interest and power to direct the policies, management and affairs thereof.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Transaction Target Date
</B>
	&#148; means (a)&nbsp;if determined in connection with a pending IPO, the date that the IPO is expected to be consummated, or (b)&nbsp;if determined in connection with a pending Sale Transaction, the date that the Sale Transaction is expected to be consummated, in each case, as estimated by the Corporation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;
<B>
	Voting Stock
</B>
	&#148; means, with respect to any person, capital stock of such person that ordinarily has voting power for the election of directors (or persons performing similar functions) of such person, whether at all times or only so long as no senior class of securities has such voting power by reason of any contingency.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Dividends
</I>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Subject to the prior preferences and other rights of any Senior Stock, the holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall be entitled to receive, when and as authorized by the Board of Directors and declared by the Corporation out of funds legally available for that purpose, dividends at the Prevailing Dividend Rate, compounded quarterly as provided below, and no more.&#160; Such dividends shall begin to accrue on the Issue Date and shall be payable on each Dividend Payment Date,
<I>
	provided that
</I>
	if any such payment date is not a Business Day then such dividend shall be payable on the next Business Day.&#160; The dividends per share of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock for any full quarterly period shall be computed by multiplying the Prevailing Dividend Rate for such Dividend Period by the Liquidation Preference per share and dividing the result by four.&#160; Dividends payable for any period less than a full quarterly Dividend Period shall be computed on the basis of a 360-day year of twelve 30-day months and the actual number of days elapsed for any period less than one month.&#160; Dividends shall be payable in cash to extent of available cash from earnings after payment of current liabilities and such reserves as the Board of
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage32"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Directors may establish in its sole discretion;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	,
<I>
	however
</I>
	, that cash dividends payable to a Defaulting Holder shall be retained by the Corporation until such time, if ever, that such holder ceases to be a Defaulting Holder.&#160; Dividends shall be paid to the holders of record of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock as their names appear on the share register of the Corporation on the corresponding Record Date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	If full cash dividends are not paid or made available to the holders of all outstanding shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and of any Parity Stock, and funds available shall be insufficient to permit payment in full in cash to all such holders of the preferential amounts to which they are then entitled, the entire amount available for payment of cash dividends shall be distributed among the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and of any Parity Stock ratably in proportion to the full amount to which they would otherwise be respectively entitled, and any remainder not paid in cash to the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall be added to the Liquidation Preference pursuant to subparagraph 2(c)&nbsp;below;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	,
<I>
	however
</I>
	, that cash dividends payable to a Defaulting Holder shall be retained by the Corporation until such time, if ever, that such holder ceases to be a Defaulting Holder.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	If, on any Dividend Payment Date, the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (other than Defaulting Holders) shall not have received the full accrued dividends provided for in subparagraph 2(a)&nbsp;above, then the unpaid portion of such dividends (other than cash dividends payable to Defaulting Holders that have been retained by the Corporation pursuant to subparagraphs 2(a)&nbsp;and 2(b)&nbsp;above) shall be paid by adding such amount to the Liquidation Preference on the relevant Dividend Payment Date;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	, that any such addition to the Liquidation Preference shall not result in a Person Beneficially Owning or Constructively Owning shares of Capital Stock in violation of Section&nbsp;7.2.1(a)&nbsp;of the Charter in lieu of paying such dividend in cash..
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	So long as any shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall be outstanding, the Corporation shall not (i)&nbsp;declare or pay any dividend or make any distribution on any Junior Stock, whether in cash, property or otherwise (other than Permitted Dividends), or (ii)&nbsp;purchase or redeem, or permit any Subsidiary to purchase or redeem any Junior Stock, or pay or make available any monies for a sinking fund for the purchase or redemption of any Junior Stock (other than a redemption, purchase or other acquisition of Junior Stock made for purposes of an employee incentive or benefit plan of the Corporation, or a redemption, purchase or other acquisition of Junior Stock, if such redemption, purchase or acquisition is necessary in order for the Corporation to qualify, or continue to qualify, as a real estate investment trust under Sections 856 through 860 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended), unless all dividends to which the holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (other than Defaulting Holders) shall have been entitled for all previous Dividend Periods shall have been paid (including by an increase in the Liquidation Preference pursuant to subparagraph 2(c)&nbsp;above) or declared and a sum of money sufficient for the payment thereof set apart.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Distributions Upon Liquidation, Dissolution or Winding Up
</I>
	.&#160; Upon a Liquidation, subject to the prior preferences and other rights of any Senior Stock, but before any distribution or payment shall be made to the holders of Junior Stock, the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (other than Defaulting Holders) shall be entitled to be paid, to the extent possible the
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Liquidation Preference on the date of determination.&#160; If such payment shall have been made in full to the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock, and if payment shall have been made in full to the holders of any Senior Stock and Parity Stock of all amounts to which such holders shall be entitled, the remaining assets and funds of the Corporation shall be distributed among the holders of Junior Stock, according to their respective shares and priorities with shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock held by Defaulting Holders being entitled to be paid an amount equal to the Subscription Price and having the same rank and priority as shares of Common Stock.&#160; If, upon any such Liquidation, the net assets of the Corporation distributable among the holders of all outstanding shares of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and of any Parity Stock shall be insufficient to permit the payment in full to such holders of the preferential amounts to which they are entitled, then the entire net assets of the Corporation remaining after the distributions to holders of any Senior Stock of the full amounts to which they may be entitled shall be distributed among the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (other than Defaulting Holders) and of any Parity Stock ratably in proportion to the full amounts to which they would otherwise be respectively entitled.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Optional Redemption by the Corporation
</I>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall not be redeemed in whole or in part prior to June&nbsp;30, 2012.&#160; On and after July&nbsp;1, 2012, the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock may be redeemed by the Corporation in cash at any time in whole (but not in part) at the option of the Corporation, at the Redemption Price as of the Redemption Date;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	, that any such redemption shall not result in a Person Beneficially Owning or Constructively Owning shares of Capital Stock in violation of Section&nbsp;7.2.1(a)&nbsp;of the Charter.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	A notice of the Corporation&#146;s intent to redeem the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (the &#147;
<B>
	Redemption Notice
</B>
	&#148;) shall be sent by or on behalf of the Corporation, by first class mail, postage prepaid, to the holders of record of the shares to be redeemed at their respective addresses as they shall appear on the records of the Corporation, not less than five days nor more than 60 days prior to the Redemption Date (i)&nbsp;notifying such holders of the election of the Corporation to redeem such shares and (ii)&nbsp;stating the expected date of redemption and the Redemption Price payable as of such date.&#160; No failure to give such notice or any defect therein or in the mailing thereof shall affect the validity of the proceedings for the redemption of any shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock except as to the holder to whom notice was defective or not given.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	If a Redemption Notice shall have been given as hereinbefore provided, and the Corporation shall not default in the payment of the Redemption Price, then each holder of shares called for redemption shall be entitled to all preferences and relative and other rights accorded herein until and including the Redemption Date.&#160; From and after the Redemption Date the shares called for redemption shall no longer be outstanding, and all rights of the holders of such shares shall cease and terminate, except the right of the holders of such shares to receive the Redemption Price to be paid hereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	For the avoidance of doubt, nothing in this
<U>
	Section&nbsp;4
</U>
	shall prohibit the Corporation from effecting the, and the Corporation shall to the extent not prohibited by law be entitled at any time and from time to time to, repurchase in the open market, in privately negotiated transactions or through tender offers or other transactions any amount of the then
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	35
<A NAME="A2227485ZEX-3_1_HTM_23256-2-KE-07_PB_35_082524_9862">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=35,EFW="2227485",CP="ARES COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE CORP",DN="2",CHK=606203,FOLIO='35',FILE="DISK106:[15ZCW2.15ZCW15602]23256-2-KE-07_ZCW15602.CHC",USER="VRIVERA",CD='FEB 27 08:31 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage34"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	outstanding shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock that it desires to repurchase at such sums and on such conditions as shall be negotiated between or among the Corporation and one or more holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Conversion Rights
</I>
	.&#160; The Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall be convertible into Common Stock as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Automatic Conversion
</I>
	.&#160; Each outstanding share of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (other than Non-Converting Shares) shall automatically be converted, without any further act of the Corporation or its stockholders, into fully paid and nonassessable shares of Common Stock upon the consummation of an IPO or Sale Transaction in accordance with this subparagraph 5;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	, that such automatic conversion shall not result in a Person Beneficially Owning or Constructively Owning shares of Capital Stock in violation of Section&nbsp;7.2.1(a)&nbsp;of the Charter.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Conversion Notice
</I>
	.&#160; Not less than 15 Business Days prior to the Transaction Target Date, the Corporation shall send or cause to be sent, by first class mail, postage prepaid, or by electronic delivery (including by facsimile and electronic mail) to the holders of record of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock, at their respective addresses as they shall appear on the records of the Corporation, a notice that the Corporation expects the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock to automatically convert into Common Stock pursuant to subparagraph 5(a)&nbsp;above (the &#147;
<B>
	Conversion Notice
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; The Conversion Notice shall state (i)&nbsp;the Transaction Target Date and (ii)&nbsp;Estimated Conversion Price.&#160; In the event that the IPO or Sale Transaction is not consummated within 90 days after the Transaction Target Date, prior to any automatic conversion, the Corporation shall send or cause to be sent, by first class mail, postage prepaid, or by electronic delivery (including by facsimile and electronic mail) to the holders of record of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock, at their respective addresses as they shall appear on the records of the Corporation, a new Conversion Notice with a revised Transaction Target Date and Estimated Conversion Price.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Election for Optional Redemption
</I>
	.&#160; Holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (other than Defaulting Holders) may elect to have their shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock redeemed, in whole or in part, in lieu of being converted pursuant to subparagraph 5(a)&nbsp;above, by delivering a signed notice of such an election, by first class mail, postage prepaid, or by electronic delivery (including by facsimile and electronic mail) to the Corporation within 10 Business Days after the date of the Conversion Notice (or an amended Conversion Notice), which notice shall (i)&nbsp;state the name of such holder, as it appears on the records of the Corporation, (ii)&nbsp;state the total number of shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock held by such holder and (iii)&nbsp;state the number of shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock that such holder elects to have redeemed in lieu of being converted pursuant to subparagraph 5(a)&nbsp;above (the &#147;
<B>
	Non-Converting Shares
</B>
	&#148;);
<I>
	provided
</I>
	, that such optional redemption shall not result in a Person Beneficially Owning or Constructively Owning shares of Capital Stock in violation of Section&nbsp;7.2.1(a)&nbsp;of the Charter.&#160; Upon the consummation of an IPO or Sale Transaction, the Non-Converting Shares shall be redeemed by the Corporation at the Redemption Price on the Conversion Date using proceeds from the IPO or Sale Transaction.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	36
<A NAME="A2227485ZEX-3_1_HTM_23256-2-KE-07_PB_36_082534_9111">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=36,EFW="2227485",CP="ARES COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE CORP",DN="2",CHK=871776,FOLIO='36',FILE="DISK106:[15ZCW2.15ZCW15602]23256-2-KE-07_ZCW15602.CHC",USER="VRIVERA",CD='FEB 27 08:31 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage35"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Conversion Price
</I>
	.&#160; Each share of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (other than Non-Converting Shares) shall be converted into a number of shares of Common Stock determined by dividing (i)&nbsp;the Liquidation Preference as of the Conversion Date by (ii)&nbsp;the Conversion Price;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	,
<I>
	however
</I>
	, that shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock held by Defaulting Holders shall be converted into a number of shares of Common Stock determined by dividing (i)&nbsp;the Subscription Price by (ii)&nbsp;the Conversion Price.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Mechanics of Conversion
</I>
	.&#160; Upon the consummation of an IPO or Sale Transaction, the outstanding shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (other than Non-Converting Shares) shall be converted automatically without any further action by the holders of such shares.&#160; Conversion shall be deemed to have been effected on the date of the consummation of the IPO or Sale Transaction (the &#147;
<B>
	Conversion Date
</B>
	&#148;).&#160; The person in whose name the shares of Common Stock are to be issued shall be deemed to have become a holder of record of such Common Stock on the applicable Conversion Date.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	As promptly as practicable after the Conversion Date, the Corporation shall deliver to each former holder of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (other than Non-Converting Shares) (i)&nbsp;a certificate or certificates for the number of full shares of Common Stock to which such holder is entitled or, at the Corporation&#146;s option, confirmation of the book entry into the stock ledger of the Corporation for the number of full shares of Common Stock issuable to such holder upon conversion of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and (ii)&nbsp;a check or cash with respect to any fractional interest in a share of Common Stock as provided in subparagraph 5(f)&nbsp;below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Fractional Shares
</I>
	.&#160; No fractional shares of Common Stock or scrip shall be issued upon conversion of shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock.&#160; If more than one share of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall be surrendered for conversion at any one time by the same holder, the number of full shares of Common Stock issuable upon conversion thereof shall be computed on the basis of the aggregate number of shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock so surrendered.&#160; Instead of any fractional shares of Common Stock that would otherwise be issuable upon conversion of any shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock, the Corporation shall pay a cash adjustment in respect of such fractional interest in an amount equal to that fractional interest of the Conversion Price.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Costs
</I>
	.&#160; The Corporation shall pay all documentary, stamp, transfer or other transactional taxes attributable to the issuance or delivery of shares of Common Stock upon conversion of any shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock;
<I>
	provided that
</I>
	the Corporation shall not be required to pay any taxes which may be payable in respect of any transfer involved in the issuance or delivery of any certificate for such shares in a name other than that of the holder of the shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock in respect of which such shares are being issued, and no such issue or delivery shall be made unless and until the person requesting such issuance has paid to the Corporation the amount of any such tax, or has established to the reasonable satisfaction of the Corporation that such tax has been or will be paid.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Voting Rights
</I>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	The holders of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall have no voting rights except as set forth herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	37
<A NAME="A2227485ZEX-3_1_HTM_23256-2-KE-07_PB_37_082551_6952">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=37,EFW="2227485",CP="ARES COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE CORP",DN="2",CHK=560092,FOLIO='37',FILE="DISK106:[15ZCW2.15ZCW15602]23256-2-KE-07_ZCW15602.CHC",USER="VRIVERA",CD='FEB 27 08:31 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage36"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Without the consent of the holders of at least a majority of the shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock then outstanding, given in writing or by electronic transmission or by vote at a meeting of the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock called for such purpose, the Corporation will not amend, alter or repeal any provision of the Charter, including the terms of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock (in any such case, whether by merger, consolidation or otherwise), if such action materially and adversely affects the rights, preferences or privileges of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	,
<I>
	however
</I>
	, with respect to such action, so long as the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock remains outstanding with the terms thereof materially unchanged or the holders of shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock receive equity securities of the successor or survivor of such action with substantially identical rights as the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock, taking into account that the Corporation may not be the surviving entity or the surviving entity may not be a corporation, such action shall not be deemed to materially and adversely affect such rights, preferences or privileges of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock and in such case the holders of shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall not have any voting rights with respect to such action unless the number of authorized shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock is increased to a number greater than 125;
<I>
	provided
</I>
	,
<I>
	further
</I>
	, that Defaulting Holders shall not be entitled to any voting rights and shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock held by Defaulting Holders shall be excluded in calculating whether a majority of the shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock have consented.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Without the consent of the holders of at least a majority of the shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock then outstanding, given in writing or by electronic transmission or by vote at a meeting of the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock called for such purpose, the Corporation will not issue shares of any other class of Parity Stock that would result in the Coverage Ratio being less than 1:1; provided, however, that Defaulting Holders shall not be entitled to any voting rights and shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock held by Defaulting Holders shall be excluded in calculating whether a majority of the shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock have consented.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	Without the consent of the holders of at least a majority of the shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock then outstanding, given in writing or by electronic transmission or by vote at a meeting of the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock called for such purpose, the Corporation will not issue shares of any other class of Senior Stock; provided, however, that Defaulting Holders shall not be entitled to any voting rights and shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock held by Defaulting Holders shall be excluded in calculating whether a majority of the shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock have consented.&#160; Notwithstanding anything to the contrary herein, no consent of the holders of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall be required for the Corporation to issue any indebtedness, other than indebtedness that is convertible into a class of Senior Stock.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Exclusion of Other Rights
</I>
	.&#160; The shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall not have any preferences or relative, participating, optional or other special rights, other than those specifically set forth herein.&#160; The shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock shall have no preemptive or subscription rights.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	8.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Headings of Subdivisions
</I>
	.&#160; The headings of the various subdivisions hereof are for convenience of reference only and shall not affect the interpretation of any of the provisions hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	38
<A NAME="A2227485ZEX-3_1_HTM_23256-2-KE-07_PB_38_082608_9801">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage37"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	9.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Severability of Provisions
</I>
	.&#160; If any right, preference or limitation of the Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock set forth in the terms thereof (as may be amended from time to time) is invalid, unlawful or incapable of being enforced by reason of any rule&nbsp;of law or public policy, all other rights, preferences and limitations set forth in the terms thereof (as so amended) which can be given effect without the invalid, unlawful or unenforceable right, preference or limitation shall, nevertheless, remain in full force and effect, and no right, preference or limitation herein set forth shall be deemed dependent upon any other such right, preference or limitation unless so expressed herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	10.
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<I>
	Status of Reacquired Shares
</I>
	.&#160; Shares of Series&nbsp;A Preferred Stock which have been issued and reacquired in any manner shall (upon compliance with any applicable provisions of the laws of the State of Maryland) have the status of authorized and unissued shares of Preferred Stock, undesignated as to series, and, subject to the provisions hereof, may be redesignated and reissued by the Board of Directors.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">

	Exhibit 10.52
</FONT>

</P>
<P ALIGN="RIGHT" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AMENDMENT NO. 2
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	TO
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	BRIDGE LOAN WAREHOUSING CREDIT AND SECURITY AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	THIS AMENDMENT NO. 2 (this &#147;
<U>
	Amendment
</U>
	&#148;) is entered into as of February&nbsp;26, 2016, by and among ACRC LENDER B LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (the &#147;
<U>
	Borrower
</U>
	&#148;), the Persons party to the Credit Agreement (as defined herein) from time to time as lenders (the &#147;
<U>
	Lenders
</U>
	&#148;), and BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., a national banking association
</FONT>
	, as a Lender and in its capacity as administrative agent for the Lenders under the Credit Agreement (in its capacity as administrative agent, the &#147;
<U>
	Administrative Agent
</U>
	&#148;).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<B>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RECITALS
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Reference is made to the following:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	WHEREAS, the Borrower, the Lenders and the Administrative Agent are parties to that certain Bridge Loan Warehousing Credit and Security Agreement, dated as of May&nbsp;27, 2015 (as amended, restated, supplemented, extended, renewed or otherwise modified from time to time, the &#147;
<U>
	Credit Agreement
</U>
	&#148;).&#160;
</FONT>
	Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the same meanings herein as ascribed to them in the Credit Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	WHEREAS, the Borrower has requested that the Lenders and the Administrative Agent
</FONT>
	add MF Property (as defined below) as a type of Property; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	WHEREAS,
</FONT>
	in response to such request, the parties have agreed to amend the Credit Agreement solely upon the terms and conditions set forth herein, it being the intention of the parties that such amendments shall not constitute a novation of the obligations of the Borrower under the Credit Agreement and the other Loan Documents.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	NOW THEREFORE, for good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged by the Borrower, the Lenders and the
</FONT>
	Administrative Agent
</FONT>
	, the parties hereto agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:.5IN;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1
</FONT>
</U>
	.
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Amendments to Credit Agreement
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.1
</FONT>
</U>
	.
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Additional Definition
</U>
	.&#160; The Credit Agreement is hereby amended by adding the following definition to
<U>
	Section&nbsp;12.1
</U>
	of the Credit Agreement in the appropriate alphabetical order:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;&#145;
<U>
	MF Property
</U>
	&#146; means a Multifamily Property consisting of general or affordable multifamily housing that is not an AL Property, an IL Property, a SN Property, student housing, a manufactured housing community or other dedicated housing.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.2
</FONT>
</U>
	.
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Definition of Applicable Margin
</U>
	.&#160; The definition of &#147;Applicable Margin&#148; set forth in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;12.1
</U>
	of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting it in its entirety and replacing it with the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;&#145;
<U>
	Applicable Margin
</U>
	&#146; means, with respect to LIBOR Loans and Alternative Base Rate Loans, the applicable interest rate margin per annum with respect to each Warehousing Advance, as determined pursuant to the below pricing grid, based on whether the Warehousing Advance relates to an AL Property, an IL Property, a MF Property or a SN Property:

	bps&nbsp;&#148;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.3
</FONT>
</U>
	.
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Definition of Property
</U>
	.&#160; The definition of &#147;Property&#148; set forth in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;12.1
</U>
	of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting it in its entirety and replacing it with the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;&#145;
<U>
	Property
</U>
	&#146; means an AL Property, an IL Property, a MF Property or a SN Property.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.4
</FONT>
</U>
	.
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Definition of Underwriting Guidelines
</U>
	. The definition of &#147;Underwriting Guidelines&#148; set forth in
<U>
	Section&nbsp;12.1
</U>
	of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting it in its entirety and replacing it with the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;&#145;
<U>
	Underwriting Guidelines
</U>
	&#146; means Borrower&#146;s policies and procedures for underwriting Mortgage Loans secured by Multifamily Properties, constituting AL Properties,&nbsp;IL Properties, MF Properties or SN Properties for a Targeted Permanent Loan Program, as in effect on the date of this Agreement, a copy of which has been provided to and approved by Administrative Agent, as the same may be modified from time to time in accordance with this Agreement.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.0IN;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.5
</FONT>
</U>
	.
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Warehousing Advance Debt Service Coverage Ratio Covenants
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Section&nbsp;3.3(f)
</U>
	&nbsp;of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting it in its entirety and replacing it with the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 2.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;(f)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	If the Warehousing Advance Debt Service Coverage Ratio with respect to any Pledged Loan is less than (i)&nbsp;1.50 to 1.00 for an AL Property, (ii)&nbsp;1.40 to 1.00 for an IL Property, (iii)&nbsp;1.20 to 1.00 for a MF Property, or (iv)&nbsp;1.60 to 1.00 for a SN Property, as of the
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
	2
<A NAME="A2227485ZEX-10_52_HTM_23256-2-LA-01_PB_2_034222_8694">
</A>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<HR SIZE="3" WIDTH="100%" NOSHADE ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="COLOR:#010101;">
</DIV>
</DIV>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=2,EFW="2227485",CP="ARES COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE CORP",DN="3",CHK=816443,FOLIO='2',FILE="DISK106:[15ZCW2.15ZCW15602]23256-2-LA-01_ZCW15602.CHC",USER="VRIVERA",CD='MAR 1 04:19 2016' -->
<A NAME="eolPage40"></A>
<BR CLEAR="ALL" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS;">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 2.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	last day of any Fiscal Quarter, the Borrower shall prepay the related Warehousing Advance, within five (5)&nbsp;Business Days after such testing was required to be reported, by at least an amount such that, if such prepayment had been made as of the applicable testing date, the Warehousing Advance Debt Service Coverage Ratio with respect to such Pledged Loan would have been at least (w)&nbsp;1.50 to 1.00 for an AL Property, (x)1.40 to 1.00 for an IL Property, (y)&nbsp;1.20 to 1.00 for a MF Property, or (z)&nbsp;1.60 to 1.00 for a SN Property, as of such quarterly testing date.&#148;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Section&nbsp;8.1(w)
</U>
	&nbsp;of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting it in its entirety and replacing it with the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 2.0IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;(w)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	As of the date of closing of the Mortgage Loan against which a Warehousing Advance is being made and as of the date such Warehousing Advance is made the Warehousing Advance Debt Service Coverage Ratio must be at least (i)&nbsp;1.50 to 1.00 with respect any AL Property, (ii)&nbsp;1.40 to 1.00 for any IL Property, (iii)&nbsp;1.20 to 1.00 for any MF Property, and (iv)&nbsp;1.60 to 1.00 for any SN Property.&#160; For the purposes of calculating Warehousing Advance Debt Service Coverage Ratio, (y)&nbsp;the Property EBITDA shall be determined on a trailing twelve month basis, and (z)&nbsp;the Testing Debt Service Amount shall be determined using the total outstanding amount of the related Warehousing Advances for the subject Mortgage Loan.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.6
</FONT>
</U>
	.
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Warehousing Advance-to-Mortgage Loan Ratio Covenant
</U>
	.&#160;
<U>
	Section&nbsp;3.3(g)
</U>
	&nbsp;of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting it in its entirety and replacing it with the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT 1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&#147;(g)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
	If the Warehousing Advance-to-Mortgage Loan Ratio exceeds (i)&nbsp;65% for any AL Property, (ii)&nbsp;70% for any IL Property, (iii)&nbsp;80% for any MF Property, or (iv)&nbsp;65% for any SN Property, as of the last day of the second or fourth Fiscal Quarters of any Fiscal Year, Borrower shall prepay such Warehousing Advance, within five (5)&nbsp;Business Days after such quarterly testing date was required to be reported, by at least an amount such that, if such prepayment had been made as of the applicable testing date, the Warehousing Advance-to-Mortgage Loan Ratio would not exceed (w)&nbsp;65% for any AL Property, (x)&nbsp;70% for any IL Property, (y)&nbsp;80% for any MF Property, or (z)&nbsp;65% for any SN Property, as of such semi-annual testing date.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.0IN;">
<U>
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	Section&nbsp;1.7
</FONT>
</U>
	.
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Warehousing Advance-to-Appraised Value Ratio Covenants
</U>
	.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;TEXT-INDENT:1.5IN;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT SIZE="1" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:8.5PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<U>
	Section&nbsp;5.2(k)
</U>
	&nbsp;of the Credit Agreement is hereby amended by deleting it in its entirety and replacing it with the following:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0IN 0IN .0001PT;">
<FONT SIZE="2" FACE="TIMES NEW ROMAN" STYLE="FONT-SIZE:10.0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
